title: Alteration of Criteria for Eligibility) Act 2020 (No.11 of 2020), with the consent
heading: 1. This order may be cited as the Health (General Practitioner Service and
text_raw:
1. This order may be cited as the Health (General Practitioner Service and 
Alteration of Criteria for Eligibility) Act 2020 (Section 2) (Commencement) 
Order 2020.

title: Alteration of Criteria for Eligibility) Act 2020 (No.11 of 2020), with the consent
heading: 2. The 1st day of November 2020 is appointed as the day on which section
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of November 2020 is appointed as the day on which section 
2 of the Health (General Practitioner Service and Alteration of Criteria for 
Eligibility) Act 2020 (No. 11 of 2020) comes into operation. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 30th October, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform consents to the making of the 
foregoing Order. 

[462] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

20 October, 2020. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 
Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

27 October, 2020. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [462]

title: Alteration of Criteria for Eligibility) Act 2020 (No.11 of 2020), with the consent
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

This Order appoints 1 November 2020 as the day on which Section 2 of the 
Health (General Practitioner Service and Alteration of Criteria for Eligibility) 
Act 2020 comes into operation, which provides for increases to the gross income 
limits for medical card eligibility for persons aged 70 or older. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [462] 5
